scavengerHuntDescription: Can you find all of the parks in Sault Ste. Marie's P-Patch neighbourhood?

clues.clueDescription: This park is located behind an elementary school.
clues.answerTitle: Park behind Ben R. McMullin School
clues.answerDescription: This park includes swings, slides, and a jungle gym.

clues.clueDescription: This park is stocked with toys, generously shared by a neighbour.
clues.answerDescription: This park includes a slide, swings, and a small climbing structure.

clues.clueDescription: Mostly used in the winter time, this park is set up for 'relaxing large'!
clues.answerTitle: Big Blue Chair on Finn Hill
clues.answerDescription: Take in the view from a huge Muskoka chair!
A small park, with two swings and a small climber.
Behind the old St. Bernadette School, equipped with lots of swings, multiple slides, and a rocket ship climber.
